thread.title: Baby born with two heads described as ‘wonderful gift from God’ tragically dies just hours after being born
thread.title_full: Baby born with two heads described as ‘wonderful gift from God’ tragically dies just hours after being born

author: yjeffery
title: Baby born with two heads described as ‘wonderful gift from God’ tragically dies just hours after being born
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments A BABY boy born with two heads and described as a “gift from God” by his parents died just hours after being born. 
The unnamed boy, who had two heads on one body, was born to parents Nasreen, 30, and Naseem Mohammad, 34, in India. South West News Service 2 A ‘gift from God’… the unnamed baby boy died just a few hours after being born in India on Wednesday 
His distraught parents only found out about the malformation during an ultrasound the day before he was born, local reports claim. 
The pair, who have four other kids, are said to have told doctors they were “ready to accept a child under any circumstances”. 
The baby was born via C-section at SP Hospital in Yamunanagar, Haryana, India , on Wednesday, but only lived for a few hours. RELATED STORIES SHOCK DELIVERY Conjoined twins born with two heads and one body fight for life - as docs decide if they'll survive separation Medical miracle The amazing moment twins conjoined at the head take a good look at each other for the first time 'KENYA SHARES FAMILY'S JOY' Conjoined twin girls survive 23-hour surgery to separate them in operation hailed as a 'first for sub-Saharan Africa' 'TRY TO SAVE THEM!' Mum of identical conjoined twins faces agonising TWO-YEAR wait to find out if they can be separated MIRACLE TOTS Twins conjoined at the head are separated after incredible 20-hour surgery 'I was ashamed' Woman, 35, who has never had a boyfriend because of bum deformity caused by conjoined twin goes on Botched 
Speaking on the tragic death, a local source said: “The couple came to know of the two heads just one day prior to operation. 
“They didn’t have any scan. 
“The parents were astonished but they were ready to accept a child under any circumstance. 
“Doctors said the baby was a ‘miraculous child’ while the parents said he was a ‘wonderful gift of God’.” South West News Service 2 The tragic tot’s parents said they were ‘ready to accept a child under any circumstances’ after finding out about his condition
